entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

SNOW LIKELY
RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION UP TO 1 INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN IN THE EVENING
CLOUDY
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN, FREEZING RAIN AND SLEET IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN, FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
